name: @iftt/program-generator
description: Use the program generator to quickly and autonomously listen to specific changes in new services from server input.

scripts.lint+build+test: yarn run lint && yarn run build && yarn run test
scripts.build: echo building... && babel src/ -d lib/ && echo 'successfully built'
scripts.test: echo running server tests... && tape test/test.js | tap-summary && echo 'successfully completed tests'

author: Craig OConnor
